Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Northbound Reroute near Commercial/92nd
ShortDescription: Northbound 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Commercial, 92nd, Houston, 91st and Commercial: due to, street blockage near Commercial/92nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Commercial, 92nd, Houston, 91st and Commercial: due to, street blockage near Commercial/92nd.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
